subject: Re: New page template: 'In the News'
preview: Hi! One more thing for the In the News pages. I think we might need to limit the view to ~10 per page otherwise the scroll will be pretty long. Can we introduce a 'Next page' link please 😊  Brittan

full_threads.body:
Hi! One more thing for the In the News pages. I think we might need to limit the view to ~10 per page otherwise the scroll will be pretty long. Can we introduce a 'Next page' link please 😊

Brittany Tan

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

investmenttrends.com

Hi Chris,

Yes that's fine. If you could just let us know when you hit an hour and I can let you know whether we are ok to keep going.

Many thanks,

Britt

Brittany Tan

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

investmenttrends.com

Hi Britt, 

Sure thing.

Before we get started, I wanted to share that November's support hours have been used. Are you happy for us to continue on these updates with the works being billed as additional support hours?

Hi again!

Just realised we are missing the date published for the 'In the News' items. At the moment the date is just showing up today, however we need to be able to edit easily to show the date it was actually published. Can we please include this option in the template, and also consider that we'd like them to appear from newest to oldest.

Thank you!

Britt

Brittany Tan

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

investmenttrends.com

Cool this makes sense. I will go ahead and add the content now and let you know if I have any issues. Once I'm done, I will be back in touch if you could then make live under the 'Insights' tab?

In the meantime, could we start a new task to add buttons on the Key Industry Reports Page. Where each report has a button on the tile saying 'Learn more'. Which will then link through to the corresponding 'Reports' page. If you guys can create the functionality and then I am happy to go through and link them all.

See rough example below:



Brittany Tan

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

investmenttrends.com

Hi Britt, 

Can you please check the page layout now? 

In regards to the reports, they were just added to test the page function and sorting functions. We can remove these so you can start with a blank slate. Please let me know if you want a hand with this.

Hi @chris done fixing the issue please check, thanks

Screenshot

The mobile page view is ready for your review: https://investmenttrends.com/in-the-news/

To make your review easier, the page is now live so you won't experience the 404 when viewing it on mobile not signed in.

Hi @chris  done updating the mobile responsive

Hi @jaime,

we have approval to go ahead with responsive modes for this page, please let me know if you need anything else.

Hi Chris,

Ahh thanks!

This looks great. Happy for you to bill us your $109/hr rate to get this done. Perhaps if you spend 1 hour addition and see how far you get?

Many thanks,

Britt

Hi Britt, 

Can you please login to the WordPress dashboard and view the link? It is in draft mode which means it will return a 404 error when viewed not logged-in, or in an incognito browser window.

Hi Chris,

The page just comes through as a 404 error ☹

Brittany Tan

Senior Marketing Manager

+45 mins added to harvest

Hi Britt, 

We have prepared a desktop only draft for your review: https://investmenttrends.com/?page_id=2259&preview=true

Please note, this is a working draft as we only had 45 mins of support left for the month of November. If I recall correctly, you were keen to ensure we don't go over unless necessary. 

Let me know if we have the green light to complete, at this stage we probably need 30-60 to polish the page. This would put you in a position to be able to transfer the data from the old website.

Hi @chris 

I've made some updates to the "In the News" page at https://investmenttrends.com/in-the-news/. However, I haven't addressed the mobile responsiveness just yet as I've already spent 45 minutes on the task.


Time: +45mins

Hi @jaime 

Do you think we can create a draft for Britt in 45mins? The client only has 45 mins of support left for this Month. If not, please let me know how long you need and I'll seek approval to go over the remaining time.

Hi Chris,

As I briefly mentioned, we'd like to create a new page template called 'In the News'.

I have attached a suggested page layout. If we could try and have the articles appear in two columns, like shown, that would be ideal.

We have the existing content available here: https://oldsite.investmenttrends.com.au/our-history/investment-trends-in-the-media/

If you could please draw all information/links as is. We're looking to backdate from Jan 2023.

Many thanks,
Britt
